channel.title: Help needed may seem simple
channel.description:
NPChandler.java:217: not a statement (misc.random2(30) == 1) { ^ NPChandler.java:217: ';' expected (misc.random2(30) == 1) { ^ 2 errors press any key to continue
can any 1 help me on tht i think tht is the error makin my npcs not talk?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2007, 05:19:16 PM[/size][hr]come on sum 1 has gt 2 know it?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2007, 05:23:28 PM[/size][hr]any 1?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2007, 05:26:35 PM[/size][hr]aww cmon u av 2 know !!!!!"

item.title: Help needed may seem simple
item.dc:creator: @axl axl
item.description:
@axl wrote:

NPChandler.java:217: ';' expected (misc.random2(30) == 1) { ^

ok change it to

(misc.random2(30) == 1); {

you see that

;

‘;’ expected

means you have to put it and the

^

says where
